     <script type="text/javascript">
      window.AR.Util.CountryCode = "False"  === "True" ? "Canada" : "US";
     </script>
     <div id="ad-is-mobile">
     </div>
     <div id="ad-is-tablet">
     </div>
     <script>
      (function($) {
        
        window.adConfiguration = {
            "settings": {
                "responsiveGridSlots": 0 }
        };

        
        var mobileAdElem = document.getElementById('ad-is-mobile');
        var isMobileAds = !(mobileAdElem.offsetWidth === 0 && mobileAdElem.offsetHeight === 0);


        var isTablet = $ && $('#ad-is-tablet').css('display') === 'none';

         
        window.adService = {
            isDesktop: window.innerWidth > 1024,
            mobileAds: isMobileAds,
            tabletAds: isTablet,
            unitValues: {
                channel: "breakfast"
            },
            pageTargetingValues: {
                type: "recipe",
                "status": "unrecognized",
                "oid": "",
                "fit": "1",
                "r": "20935",
                "id": "20935",
                "k": [13,30,32,48,51,71,72,91,94,150,151,159,228,239,251,614]
            },
            suppressInterstitial: true
        };

    })($ || window.jQuery);
     </script>

       <section class="recipe-directions" data-ng-controller="ar_controllers_recipe_notes" data-ng-init="init(20935)">

         Directions
        </h2>
        <span class="recipe-directions__header--toggles" id="recipe-notes">

           <span class="note-text">
            {{model.addEditText}}
           </span>
           <span class="svg-icon--actions--edit_icon svg-icon--actions--edit_icon-dims">
           </span>
          </a>
         </span>
         <span class="recipe-directions--print">
          <a data-click-id="recipe button" data-internal-referrer-link="recipe button" ng-href="print/?recipeType=Recipe&amp;{{ printServings }}">
           <span class="kf-text print">
            Print
           </span>
           <span class="icon--recipe-directions-print">
           </span>
          </a>
         </span>
        </span>
        <div class="directions--section">
         <div class="directions--section__steps">
          <!-- cooking stats -->
          <ul class="prepTime">
           <li class="prepTime__item">
            <span class="icon--stats-clock">
            </span>
           </li>
           <li class="prepTime__item">
            <p class="prepTime__item--type">
             Prep
            </p>
            <time datetime="PT20M" itemprop="prepTime">
             <span class="prepTime__item--time">
              20
             </span>
             m
            </time>
           </li>
           <li class="prepTime__item">
            <p class="prepTime__item--type">
             Cook
            </p>
            <time datetime="PT30M" itemprop="cookTime">
             <span class="prepTime__item--time">
              30
             </span>
             m
            </time>
           </li>
           <li class="prepTime__item">
            <p class="prepTime__item--type">
             Ready In
            </p>
            <time datetime="PT9H20M" itemprop="totalTime">
             <span class="prepTime__item--time">
              9
             </span>
             h
             <span class="prepTime__item--time">
              20
             </span>
             m
            </time>
           </li>
          </ul>
          <ol class="list-numbers recipe-directions__list" itemprop="recipeInstructions">
           <li class="step" ng-class="{'finished': stepIsActive0}" ng-click="stepIsActive0 = !stepIsActive0">
            <span class="recipe-directions__list--item">
             Place bread cubes in a lightly greased 9x13 inch baking pan.
            </span>
           </li>
           <li class="step" ng-class="{'finished': stepIsActive1}" ng-click="stepIsActive1 = !stepIsActive1">
            <span class="recipe-directions__list--item">
             In a large bowl, beat cream cheese with an electric mixer at medium speed until smooth. Add eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition. Stir in milk, half and half, maple syrup, and vanilla until mixture is smooth. Pour cream cheese mixture over the bread; cover, and refrigerate overnight.
            </span>
           </li>
           <li class="step" ng-class="{'finished': stepIsActive2}" ng-click="stepIsActive2 = !stepIsActive2">
            <span class="recipe-directions__list--item">
             The next morning, remove souffle from refrigerator, and let stand at room temperature for 30 minutes. Meanwhile,  preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
            </span>
           </li>
           <li class="step" ng-class="{'finished': stepIsActive3}" ng-click="stepIsActive3 = !stepIsActive3">
            <span class="recipe-directions__list--item">
             Bake, uncovered, for 30 minutes in the preheated oven, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Sprinkle with confectioners' sugar, and serve warm.
            </span>
           </li>
          </ol>
          <a href="" ng-click="openNoteModal()">
           <ol class="list-numbers recipe-directions__list recipeNotes ng-hide" ng-cloak="" ng-show="model.itemNote">

         <div class="more-button" data-ng-hide="!moreReviewsAvailable" ng-click="getReviews()">
          <a class="moreReviews btns-one-small">
           More Reviews
          </a>
         </div>
        </div>
       </section>

      window.AR.Util.CountryCode = "False"  === "True" ? "Canada" : "US";
     </script>
     <img src="http://pubads.g.doubleclick.net/gampad/ad?iu=/3865/DFP_1x1_impression_tracker&amp;sz=1x1&amp;t=adpartner%3Dallrecipesmagazine_earned_impression&amp;c=2158a6fe-932a-41aa-b665-6e8b21338947" style="display:none"/>
     <div id="ad-is-mobile">
     </div>
     <div id="ad-is-tablet">
     </div>
     <script>
      (function($) {
        
        window.adConfiguration = {
            "settings": {
                "responsiveGridSlots": 0 }
        };

        
        var mobileAdElem = document.getElementById('ad-is-mobile');
        var isMobileAds = !(mobileAdElem.offsetWidth === 0 && mobileAdElem.offsetHeight === 0);


        var isTablet = $ && $('#ad-is-tablet').css('display') === 'none';

         
        window.adService = {
            isDesktop: window.innerWidth > 1024,
            mobileAds: isMobileAds,
            tabletAds: isTablet,
            unitValues: {
                channel: "vegetarian"
            },
            pageTargetingValues: {
                type: "recipe",
                "status": "unrecognized",
                "oid": "",
                "fit": "1",
                "r": "256021",
                "id": "256021",
                "k": [10,20,26,32,125,144,150,170,173,184,192,201,205,218,221,234,235,241,242,261,636,671,680]
            },
            suppressInterstitial: true
        };

    })($ || window.jQuery);
     </script>

       <section class="recipe-directions" data-ng-controller="ar_controllers_recipe_notes" data-ng-init="init(256021)">
        <h2 class="heading__h2--gutters">
         Directions
        </h2>
        <span class="recipe-directions__header--toggles" id="recipe-notes">
         <span class="recipe-notes" ng-cloak="">
          <a href="" ng-click="openNoteModal()">
           <span class="note-text">
            {{model.addEditText}}
           </span>
           <span class="svg-icon--actions--edit_icon svg-icon--actions--edit_icon-dims">
           </span>
          </a>
         </span>
         <span class="recipe-directions--print">
          <a data-click-id="recipe button" data-internal-referrer-link="recipe button" ng-href="print/?recipeType=Recipe&amp;{{ printServings }}">
           <span class="kf-text print">
            Print
           </span>
           <span class="icon--recipe-directions-print">
           </span>
          </a>
         </span>
        </span>
        <div class="directions--section">
         <div class="directions--section__steps">
          <!-- cooking stats -->
          <ul class="prepTime">
           <li class="prepTime__item">
            <span class="icon--stats-clock">
            </span>
           </li>
           <li class="prepTime__item">
            <p class="prepTime__item--type">
             Prep
            </p>
            <time datetime="PT15M" itemprop="prepTime">
             <span class="prepTime__item--time">
              15
             </span>
             m
            </time>
           </li>
           <li class="prepTime__item">
            <p class="prepTime__item--type">
             Cook
            </p>
            <time datetime="PT30M" itemprop="cookTime">
             <span class="prepTime__item--time">
              30
             </span>
             m
            </time>
           </li>
           <li class="prepTime__item">
            <p class="prepTime__item--type">
             Ready In
            </p>
            <time datetime="PT45M" itemprop="totalTime">
             <span class="prepTime__item--time">
              45
             </span>
             m
            </time>
           </li>
          </ul>
          <ol class="list-numbers recipe-directions__list" itemprop="recipeInstructions">
           <li class="step" ng-class="{'finished': stepIsActive0}" ng-click="stepIsActive0 = !stepIsActive0">
            <span class="recipe-directions__list--item">
             Preheat a large, heavy skillet over medium-high heat. Add 2 tablespoons oil. Break tofu apart over skillet into bite-size pieces, sprinkle with salt and pepper, then cook, stirring frequently with a thin metal spatula, until liquid cooks out and tofu browns, about 10 minutes. (If you notice liquid collecting in pan, increase heat to evaporate water.) Be sure to get under the tofu when you stir, scraping the bottom of the pan where the good, crispy stuff is and keeping it from sticking.
            </span>
           </li>
           <li class="step" ng-class="{'finished': stepIsActive1}" ng-click="stepIsActive1 = !stepIsActive1">
            <span class="recipe-directions__list--item">
             Add onion and garlic powders, turmeric, juice, and remaining tablespoon oil and toss to coat. Cook 5 minutes more.
            </span>
           </li>
           <li class="step" ng-class="{'finished': stepIsActive2}" ng-click="stepIsActive2 = !stepIsActive2">
            <span class="recipe-directions__list--item">
             Preheat a heavy-bottomed saucepan over medium-high heat. Add oil. Cook onion and jalapenos with a pinch of salt, stirring, until translucent, about 5 minutes, Add garlic and cook, stirring, until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add tomatoes, cumin, and remaining salt, and cook, stirring, until tomatoes become saucy, about 5 minutes. Add cilantro and lemon juice. Let cilantro wilt in. Add beans and heat through, stirring occasionally, about 2 minutes. Taste for salt and seasoning.
            </span>
           </li>
           <li class="step" ng-class="{'finished': stepIsActive3}" ng-click="stepIsActive3 = !stepIsActive3">
            <span class="recipe-directions__list--item">
             Spoon some hash browns into each bowl, followed by a scoop of beans and a scoop of scramble. Top with avocado, a squeeze of fresh lemon juice, and a sprinkle of cilantro. Serve with hot sauce.
            </span>
           </li>
          </ol>
          <a href="" ng-click="openNoteModal()">
           <ol class="list-numbers recipe-directions__list recipeNotes ng-hide" ng-cloak="" ng-show="model.itemNote">
            <li class="step">
             <span class="recipe-directions__list--item" ng-bind="model.itemNote">
             </span>
            </li>
           </ol>
          </a>

If I had really read the instructions b4 making it I would've cooked the garbanzo beans according to the recipe and it would've been even more tasty. A tip for cooking with tofu is extra firm cut through the middle so you have two flat thin pieces salting and peppering and leaving it cut side down in a colander to strain while u prep everything else. This will cut down on the cook time as well as a lot of the moisture will drain off before you even cook it. This is what I do whenever I want a firmer tofu.            <div class="review-detail-nav__sort__dropdownlist" id="sort" ng-click="toggleShowSortOptions()">
            <span>
             <span class="review-detail-nav__sort__dropdownlist__text" ng-bind="'Reviews: ' + sortByFriendlyName[sortBy]">
             </span>
             <span ng-class="indicatorStyle">
             </span>
            </span>
           </div>
          </div>
          <ul class="sort-nav exposed" data-ng-cloak="" ng-class="showSortFiltersStyle" ng-click="toggleShowSortOptions()">
           <li ng-bind="::sortByFriendlyName['MostHelpful']" ng-class="{'btn-grey':sortBy == 'MostHelpful'}" ng-click="getReviews('MostHelpful')">
           </li>
           <li ng-bind="::sortByFriendlyName['MostPositive']" ng-class="{'btn-grey':sortBy == 'MostPositive'}" ng-click="getReviews('MostPositive')">
           </li>
           <li ng-bind="::sortByFriendlyName['LeastPositive']" ng-class="{'btn-grey':sortBy == 'LeastPositive'}" ng-click="getReviews('LeastPositive')">
           </li>
           <li ng-bind="::sortByFriendlyName['Newest']" ng-class="{'btn-grey':sortBy == 'Newest'}" ng-click="getReviews('Newest')">
           </li>
          </ul>
         </div>

              <span class="icon--x ignore-ar-touchstart ignore-ar-touchend" ng-click="removeIngredientExclude(ingredient, $event)" unsubscribe-global-click-handler="">
               ✕
              </span>
             </span>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </div>
          <div class="ingredient-add-exclude">
           <input class="setFocus-excludeIng" id="excludeIngText" name="txtExcludeIng" ng-attr-placeholder="{{excludeIngPlaceholderText}}" ng-blur="showAds()" ng-focus="hideAds();" ng-keydown="(isBackspaceKey($event) &amp;&amp; removeLastIngredientExclude($event)) || (isTabKey($event) &amp;&amp; addIngredientExclude($event))" ng-model="excludeIngredient" type="text">
           </input>
          </div>
          <a ar-event-focus="click" ar-event-focus-id="setFocus-excludeIng" class="btn-basic--small exclude" ng-class="{ 'grayed-out': excludeIngHitMax }" ng-click="addIngredientExclude($event)">
           <span>
            —
           </span>
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="nav-tab__buttons">
          <button class="btn-basic--small btn-search" ng-click="performSearch()" ng-cloak="">
           Go
          </button>
         </div>
        </div>
        <ar-notification>
        </ar-notification>
       </form>
      </div>

     <div id="ad-is-tablet">
     </div>
     <script>
      (function($) {
        
        window.adConfiguration = {
            "settings": {
                "responsiveGridSlots": 0 }
        };

        
        var mobileAdElem = document.getElementById('ad-is-mobile');
        var isMobileAds = !(mobileAdElem.offsetWidth === 0 && mobileAdElem.offsetHeight === 0);


        var isTablet = $ && $('#ad-is-tablet').css('display') === 'none';

         
        window.adService = {
            isDesktop: window.innerWidth > 1024,
            mobileAds: isMobileAds,
            tabletAds: isTablet,
            unitValues: {
                channel: "kid"
            },
            pageTargetingValues: {
                type: "recipe",
                "status": "unrecognized",
                "oid": "",
                "fit": "1",
                "r": "21208",
                "id": "21208",
                "k": [2,13,32,50,59,82,94,112,113,127,150,165,166,168,169,195,207,239,574,637]
            },
            suppressInterstitial: true
        };

    })($ || window.jQuery);
     </script>

             In a large bowl, stir oats, nuts and sunflower kernels together. In a separate bowl, mix together oil, honey, vanilla and cinnamon. Add to dry ingredients; mix well. Spread mixture onto two ungreased baking sheets.
            </span>
           </li>
           <li class="step" ng-class="{'finished': stepIsActive2}" ng-click="stepIsActive2 = !stepIsActive2">
            <span class="recipe-directions__list--item">
             Bake in preheated oven, for 10 minutes, remove from oven and stir. Return to oven and continue baking until golden, about 10 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool completely before storing.
            </span>

I up the oil and honey just a bit, plus add a bit of real maple syrup for flavor. I add a combo of regular and golden raisins, but only at the very end (otherwise they burn-yuck!). I bake it on parchment, on a lower temp (about 225) and stir often, every 7-10 minutes. I pulled it off to another pan to cool - trust me, this is a must! And then finally, since we like ours clumpy, as it was cooling, I pulled off bits and squeezed hunks together. I then mixed about half the still warm granola with about 1/3 cup powdered milk.       window.AR.Util.CountryCode = "False"  === "True" ? "Canada" : "US";

     <div id="ad-is-tablet">
     </div>
     <script>
      (function($) {
        
        window.adConfiguration = {
            "settings": {
                "responsiveGridSlots": 0 }
        };

        
        var mobileAdElem = document.getElementById('ad-is-mobile');
        var isMobileAds = !(mobileAdElem.offsetWidth === 0 && mobileAdElem.offsetHeight === 0);


        var isTablet = $ && $('#ad-is-tablet').css('display') === 'none';

         
        window.adService = {
            isDesktop: window.innerWidth > 1024,
            mobileAds: isMobileAds,
            tabletAds: isTablet,
            unitValues: {
                channel: "breakfast"
            },
            pageTargetingValues: {
                type: "recipe",
                "status": "unrecognized",
                "oid": "",
                "fit": "1",
                "r": "245260",
                "id": "245260",
                "k": [10,11,13,30,32,51,91,106,150,162,170,173,191,195,205,235,253,539,574,614]
            },
            suppressInterstitial: true
        };

    })($ || window.jQuery);
     </script>

          </ul>

          <ol class="list-numbers recipe-directions__list" itemprop="recipeInstructions">
           <li class="step" ng-class="{'finished': stepIsActive0}" ng-click="stepIsActive0 = !stepIsActive0">
            <span class="recipe-directions__list--item">
             Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
            </span>
           </li>
           <li class="step" ng-class="{'finished': stepIsActive1}" ng-click="stepIsActive1 = !stepIsActive1">
            <span class="recipe-directions__list--item">
             Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes. Drain on paper towels. Cook and stir onion in the same skillet until soft and translucent, about 5 minutes. Remove and set aside. Heat olive oil in the skillet. Pour in eggs and cook, stirring occasionally, until set, 3 to 5 minutes.
            </span>
           </li>
           <li class="step" ng-class="{'finished': stepIsActive2}" ng-click="stepIsActive2 = !stepIsActive2">
            <span class="recipe-directions__list--item">
             Place pita bread on lined baking sheet. Spread pesto over pita; top with bacon, scrambled eggs, tomato, mushrooms, and spinach. Sprinkle Cheddar cheese over toppings.
            </span>
           </li>
           <li class="step" ng-class="{'finished': stepIsActive3}" ng-click="stepIsActive3 = !stepIsActive3">
            <span class="recipe-directions__list--item">
             Bake in the preheated oven until cheese has melted, about 10 minutes. Serve garnished with avocado slices.
            </span>
           </li>
          </ol>

           categories
          </a>
          <a href="" ng-class="{ active: isSet(4) }" ng-click="setTab(4, 'articles')">
           articles
          </a>
         </span>
        </h2>

      window.AR.Util.CountryCode = "False"  === "True" ? "Canada" : "US";
     </script>
     <div id="ad-is-mobile">
     </div>
     <div id="ad-is-tablet">
     </div>
     <script>
      (function($) {
        
        window.adConfiguration = {
            "settings": {
                "responsiveGridSlots": 0 }
        };

        
        var mobileAdElem = document.getElementById('ad-is-mobile');
        var isMobileAds = !(mobileAdElem.offsetWidth === 0 && mobileAdElem.offsetHeight === 0);


        var isTablet = $ && $('#ad-is-tablet').css('display') === 'none';

         
        window.adService = {
            isDesktop: window.innerWidth > 1024,
            mobileAds: isMobileAds,
            tabletAds: isTablet,
            unitValues: {
                channel: "breakfast"
            },
            pageTargetingValues: {
                type: "recipe",
                "status": "unrecognized",
                "oid": "",
                "fit": "1",
                "r": "7163",
                "id": "7163",
                "k": [17,23,30,32,91,97,106,166,168,169,201,228,230,614]
            },
            suppressInterstitial: true
        };

    })($ || window.jQuery);
     </script>

          <label ng-class="{true: 'checkList__item'}[true]">

           </span>

          <div data-ng-repeat='deal in deals["5020"]'>
           <div class="offer-container" data-ng-class='{"hide-deals":!deals["5020"] || !localOffersService.localOffersUserEnabled()}' ng-cloak="">
            <div class="left">
             <p>
              <span class="offer-name" data-ng-bind-html="deal.description">
              </span>
              <br/>
              <span data-ng-bind-html="deal.price" ng-show="deal.isBIU">
              </span>
              <span class="unit-cost" data-ng-bind-html="deal.priceWithExpiration" ng-show="!deal.isBIU">
              </span>
              <br/>
              <a data-ng-bind-html="deal.clickThroughText" data-ng-click="fireClickPixels(deal.clickPixels)" data-no-follow-if-external="" ng-href="{{deal.actionUrl}}" target="_blank">

           <li class="step" ng-class="{'finished': stepIsActive0}" ng-click="stepIsActive0 = !stepIsActive0">

             Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease and flour a 9x5-inch loaf pan.
            </span>
           </li>
           <li class="step" ng-class="{'finished': stepIsActive1}" ng-click="stepIsActive1 = !stepIsActive1">
            <span class="recipe-directions__list--item">
             In a medium bowl, toss blueberries in 2 tablespoons flour. Gently stir blueberries together with oats, nuts, 1 1/2 cups flour, baking soda, and salt.
            </span>
           </li>
           <li class="step" ng-class="{'finished': stepIsActive2}" ng-click="stepIsActive2 = !stepIsActive2">
            <span class="recipe-directions__list--item">
             In a large bowl, cream shortening. Gradually add sugar, beating until light and fluffy. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in mashed banana. Add blueberry mixture to creamed mixture, and stir just until moistened. Spoon batter into the prepared pan.
            </span>
           </li>
           <li class="step" ng-class="{'finished': stepIsActive3}" ng-click="stepIsActive3 = !stepIsActive3">
            <span class="recipe-directions__list--item">
             Bake in preheated oven until a wooden toothpick comes out clean when inserted in the center of the loaf, 50 to 55 minutes. Cool in pan for 10 minutes. Remove from pan, and cool completely on a wire rack.
            </span>
           </li>
          </ol>
          <a href="" ng-click="openNoteModal()">
           <ol class="list-numbers recipe-directions__list recipeNotes ng-hide" ng-cloak="" ng-show="model.itemNote">
            <li class="step">
             <span class="recipe-directions__list--item" ng-bind="model.itemNote">
             </span>
            </li>
           </ol>
          </a>
          <div id="karma-lazy-seriesDetails">
          </div>
         </div>

                 </span>
                </div>
               </a>
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>

       <section class="recipe-reviews" id="reviews" ng-controller="ar_controllers_recipe_reviews" ng-init="init('7163', 2, 9, 'Recipe', 31, 'MostHelpful')">
        <h2 class="heading__h2--gutters review">

         </div>

      window.AR.Util.CountryCode = "False"  === "True" ? "Canada" : "US";
     </script>
     <div id="ad-is-mobile">
     </div>
     <div id="ad-is-tablet">
     </div>
     <script>
      (function($) {
        
        window.adConfiguration = {
            "settings": {
                "responsiveGridSlots": 0 }
        };

        
        var mobileAdElem = document.getElementById('ad-is-mobile');
        var isMobileAds = !(mobileAdElem.offsetWidth === 0 && mobileAdElem.offsetHeight === 0);


        var isTablet = $ && $('#ad-is-tablet').css('display') === 'none';

         
        window.adService = {
            isDesktop: window.innerWidth > 1024,
            mobileAds: isMobileAds,
            tabletAds: isTablet,
            unitValues: {
                channel: "breakfast"
            },
            pageTargetingValues: {
                type: "recipe",
                "status": "unrecognized",
                "oid": "",
                "fit": "1",
                "r": "246512",
                "id": "246512",
                "k": [30,32,36,169,175,179,195,614,657]
            },
            suppressInterstitial: true
        };

    })($ || window.jQuery);
     </script>

          <div class="recipe-summary__stars">
           <div class="rating-stars" data-ratingstars="5" data-scroll-to-anchor="reviews">

            "Add puff pastry to the list of good things you can snackify in your waffle iron. Although they don't puff up as much as oven-baked puff pastry, they turn out crispy on the outside and tender on the inside, and they take only minutes to make. Serve hot or at room temperature with syrup, fruit, Nutella®, fruit preserves, or nut butter."

           Ingredient Search
          </div>
         </input>
        </div>
       </li>

      <div class="nav-tab nav-tab__search ng-hide" ng-cloak="" popup-panel="topNavSearchMenu">
       <form>
        <div data-ng-controller="ar_controllers_search">
         <span class="icon--close" hidewhenclicked="" title="Close Ingredient Search">
         </span>
         <div class="input-wrap--home">
          <span class="search-spyglass">
           <img alt="Allrecipes" height="23" src="http://images.media-allrecipes.com/ar-images/icons/NavSearchIcon.svg" width="23"/>
          </span>
          <input class="setFocus-keywordSearch" id="searchText" ng-model="search.keywords" placeholder="Keywords" type="text">
          </input>
         </div>
         <div ar-assign-scrollable-classes="{ outermostWrapper: 'ingredients', clippingFrame: 'ingredient-clipping-frame', draggableElement: 'ingredient-scroller' }" class="input-wrap--home ingredients">
          <div class="ingredient-clipping-frame">
           <ul ar-touchend="touchEnd($event)" ar-touchstart="touchStart($event)" class="ingredient-scroller" ng-mousedown="mouseDown($event)" ng-mouseup="mouseUp($event)" onselectstart="return false;" unselectable="on">
            <li ng-repeat="ingredient in search.ingredientsInclude">
             <span>
              <span ng-bind="::ingredient">
              </span>
              <span class="icon--x ignore-ar-touchstart ignore-ar-touchend" ng-click="removeIngredientInclude(ingredient, $event)" unsubscribe-global-click-handler="">
               ✕
              </span>
             </span>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </div>
          <div class="ingredient-add-exclude">
           <input class="setFocus-includeIng" id="includeIngText" name="txtIncludeIng" ng-attr-placeholder="{{includeIngPlaceholderText}}" ng-blur="showAds()" ng-focus="hideAds();" ng-keydown="(isBackspaceKey($event) &amp;&amp; removeLastIngredientInclude($event)) || (isTabKey($event) &amp;&amp; addIngredientInclude($event))" ng-model="includeIngredient" type="text">
           </input>
          </div>
          <a ar-event-focus="click" ar-event-focus-id="setFocus-includeIng" class="btn-basic--small include" ng-class="{ 'grayed-out': includeIngHitMax }" ng-click="addIngredientInclude($event)">
           <span>
            +
           </span>
          </a>
         </div>
         <div ar-assign-scrollable-classes="{ outermostWrapper: 'ingredients', clippingFrame: 'ingredient-clipping-frame', draggableElement: 'ingredient-scroller' }" class="input-wrap--home ingredients">
          <div class="ingredient-clipping-frame">
           <ul ar-touchend="touchEnd($event)" ar-touchstart="touchStart($event)" class="ingredient-scroller" ng-mousedown="mouseDown($event)" ng-mouseup="mouseUp($event)" onselectstart="return false;" unselectable="on">
            <li ng-repeat="ingredient in search.ingredientsExclude">
             <span class="exclude-item">
              <span ng-bind="::ingredient">
              </span>
              <span class="icon--x ignore-ar-touchstart ignore-ar-touchend" ng-click="removeIngredientExclude(ingredient, $event)" unsubscribe-global-click-handler="">
               ✕
              </span>
             </span>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </div>
          <div class="ingredient-add-exclude">
           <input class="setFocus-excludeIng" id="excludeIngText" name="txtExcludeIng" ng-attr-placeholder="{{excludeIngPlaceholderText}}" ng-blur="showAds()" ng-focus="hideAds();" ng-keydown="(isBackspaceKey($event) &amp;&amp; removeLastIngredientExclude($event)) || (isTabKey($event) &amp;&amp; addIngredientExclude($event))" ng-model="excludeIngredient" type="text">
           </input>
          </div>
          <a ar-event-focus="click" ar-event-focus-id="setFocus-excludeIng" class="btn-basic--small exclude" ng-class="{ 'grayed-out': excludeIngHitMax }" ng-click="addIngredientExclude($event)">
           <span>
            —
           </span>
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="nav-tab__buttons">
          <button class="btn-basic--small btn-search" ng-click="performSearch()" ng-cloak="">
           Go
          </button>
         </div>
        </div>
        <ar-notification>
        </ar-notification>
       </form>
      </div>

     <div id="ad-is-tablet">

     <script>
      (function($) {
        
        window.adConfiguration = {
            "settings": {
                "responsiveGridSlots": 0 }
        };

        
        var mobileAdElem = document.getElementById('ad-is-mobile');
        var isMobileAds = !(mobileAdElem.offsetWidth === 0 && mobileAdElem.offsetHeight === 0);


        var isTablet = $ && $('#ad-is-tablet').css('display') === 'none';

         
        window.adService = {
            isDesktop: window.innerWidth > 1024,
            mobileAds: isMobileAds,
            tabletAds: isTablet,
            unitValues: {
                channel: "soup"
            },
            pageTargetingValues: {
                type: "recipe",
                "status": "unrecognized",
                "oid": "",
                "fit": "1",
                "r": "78052",
                "id": "78052",
                "k": [20,27,35,46,49,79,112,125,148,173,183,201,215,221,228,235,241,242,247,250,251,254,259,617,684,700]
            },
            suppressInterstitial: true
        };

    })($ || window.jQuery);
     </script>

            <span class="recipe-directions__list--item">
             Pour the vegetable broth into a large pot. Add the barley, carrots, celery, tomatoes, zucchini, garbanzo beans, onion, and bay leaves. Season with garlic powder, sugar, salt, pepper, parsley, curry powder, paprika, and Worcestershire sauce. Bring to a boil, then cover and simmer over medium-low heat for 90 minutes. The soup will be very thick. You may adjust by adding more broth or less barley if desired. Remove bay leaves before serving.
            </span>

        var reviewsInitialSet = {"recipeId":78052,"recipeTitle":"Beaker's Vegetable Barley Soup","recipeImageUrl":"http://images.media-allrecipes.com/userphotos/250x250/336612.jpg","heroImage":"http://images.media-allrecipes.com/userphotos/560x315/336612.jpg","reviews":{"MostHelpfulPositive":{"text":"Original recipe is 5 star and perfect for my vegetarian friends.  Personally, I am a carnorvoire and have tried variations of this soup and all have been wonderful including the original posting.  Try the following suggestions if you'd like to change it up:  1.)  1/2 vegetable and 1/2 beef broth to replace all vegetable broth.  2.)  Add diced red meat - if using a tougher cut, let it simmer in the broth until tender making sure your liquid doesn't reduce down much before adding the carrots and celery.  The beef imparts a much richer flavor.  3.)  1/2 cup cooked barley is sufficient for this recipe, otherwise the barley soaks up the liquid.  Enjoy!!!","rating":5.0,"reviewID":2326135,"helpfulCount":445,"dateLastModified":"January 19, 2010","submitter":{"userID":3469461,"name":"Crystal S","profileUrl":"/cook/3469461/","photo":{"urls":[{"url":"http://images.media-allrecipes.com/userphotos/90x90/00/36/96/369678.jpg"}]},"followersCount":161,"favoritesCount":801,"madeRecipesCount":279,"city":null,"region":null}},"MostHelpfulNegative":{"text":"We did not care for this recipe.","rating":1.0,"reviewID":3174166,"helpfulCount":10,"dateLastModified":"April 08, 2011","submitter":{"userID":5752983,"name":"Hungry Bear","profileUrl":"/cook/5752983/","photo":{"urls":[{"url":"http://images.media-allrecipes.com/userphotos/90x90/00/62/16/621671.jpg"}]},"followersCount":0,"favoritesCount":37,"madeRecipesCount":12,"city":null,"region":null}},"MostPositiveIndex":1,"MostCriticalIndex":18,"Reviews":[{"text":"Original recipe is 5 star and perfect for my vegetarian friends.      <script type="text/javascript">
      window.AR.Util.CountryCode = "False"  === "True" ? "Canada" : "US";
     </script>
     <div id="ad-is-mobile">
     </div>
     <div id="ad-is-tablet">
     </div>
     <script>
      (function($) {
        
        window.adConfiguration = {
            "settings": {
                "responsiveGridSlots": 0 }
        };

        
        var mobileAdElem = document.getElementById('ad-is-mobile');
        var isMobileAds = !(mobileAdElem.offsetWidth === 0 && mobileAdElem.offsetHeight === 0);


        var isTablet = $ && $('#ad-is-tablet').css('display') === 'none';

         
        window.adService = {
            isDesktop: window.innerWidth > 1024,
            mobileAds: isMobileAds,
            tabletAds: isTablet,
            unitValues: {
                channel: "sandwich"
            },
            pageTargetingValues: {
                type: "recipe",
                "status": "unrecognized",
                "oid": "",
                "fit": "1",
                "r": "61648",
                "id": "61648",
                "k": [11,30,39,51,102,138,150,191,195,202,230,235,241,253,574,615]
            },
            suppressInterstitial: true
        };

    })($ || window.jQuery);
     </script>

             </nutrition-line>
            </li>
            <li class="light-underline">
             <nutrition-line nutrient="::nutrition.calcium">
             </nutrition-line>

             </nutrition-line>

             <nutrition-line nutrient="::nutrition.thiamin">
             </nutrition-line>

             </nutrition-line>

             </nutrition-line>

             </nutrition-line>

             <nutrition-line nutrient="::nutrition.folate">
             </nutrition-line>

           </ul>
           <ul class="key">
            <li>
             <span class="left">
              *
             </span>
             <span class="right">
              Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs.
             </span>
            </li>
            <li>
             <span class="left">
              **
             </span>
             <span class="right">
              Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data.
             </span>
            </li>

             <span class="left">
              (-)
             </span>
             <span class="right">
              Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption.
             </span>
            </li>
           </ul>

       <section class="recipe-directions" data-ng-controller="ar_controllers_recipe_notes" data-ng-init="init(61648)">
        <h2 class="heading__h2--gutters">
         Directions
        </h2>
        <span class="recipe-directions__header--toggles" id="recipe-notes">
         <span class="recipe-notes" ng-cloak="">
          <a href="" ng-click="openNoteModal()">
           <span class="note-text">
            {{model.addEditText}}
           </span>
           <span class="svg-icon--actions--edit_icon svg-icon--actions--edit_icon-dims">
           </span>
          </a>
         </span>
         <span class="recipe-directions--print">
          <a data-click-id="recipe button" data-internal-referrer-link="recipe button" ng-href="print/?recipeType=Recipe&amp;{{ printServings }}">
           <span class="kf-text print">
            Print
           </span>
           <span class="icon--recipe-directions-print">
           </span>
          </a>
         </span>
        </span>
        <div class="directions--section">
         <div class="directions--section__steps">
          <!-- cooking stats -->
          <ul class="prepTime hide">
          </ul>
          <ol class="list-numbers recipe-directions__list" itemprop="recipeInstructions">
           <li class="step" ng-class="{'finished': stepIsActive0}" ng-click="stepIsActive0 = !stepIsActive0">
            <span class="recipe-directions__list--item">
             Place bacon in a large, deep skillet. Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown. Drain, and set aside.
            </span>
           </li>
           <li class="step" ng-class="{'finished': stepIsActive1}" ng-click="stepIsActive1 = !stepIsActive1">
            <span class="recipe-directions__list--item">
             Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Spread butter onto one side of each slice of bread. Lay 4 slices of bread, butter side down, in the skillet. Top with a slice of cheese, 2 slices tomato, bacon, and another slice of cheese. Cover with a slice of bread, butter side out. Fry sandwiches until golden on both sides.
            </span>
           </li>
          </ol>
          <a href="" ng-click="openNoteModal()">
           <ol class="list-numbers recipe-directions__list recipeNotes ng-hide" ng-cloak="" ng-show="model.itemNote">
            <li class="step">
             <span class="recipe-directions__list--item" ng-bind="model.itemNote">
             </span>
            </li>
           </ol>
          </a>
          <div id="karma-lazy-seriesDetails">
          </div>
         </div>

The bread gets toasted around the edges but not much on the bottoms (I like this texture) and you get twice the bacon and cheese. The tomato tends to get juicy when cooked so I use a fork. Also, when I do make bacon I cook the whole pound and freeze the extra slices in a freezer bag. (If any survive that long!) They do not stick to each other frozen. Remove as many strips as you need.
